fields.markEmailsOptedOut: Mark email addresses as Opted Out for Unsubscribed Recipients

help.Google:
Obtain OAuth 2.0 credentials from the Google Developers Console.

Visit Google Developers Console to obtain OAuth 2.0 credentials such as a Client ID and Client Secret that are known to both Google and Sevenhives application.
help.MailChimp:
MailChimp Configuration

You can get your API Key in your MailChimp Account, in Extras tab select API keys, or click here

tooltips.createEmails: Fetch sent emails from MailChimp and relate to your Recipients in Sevenhives. Recommendation: Do not fetch emails if you use big recipient lists.
